definition: decorated knob protruding from seal, allowing it to be strung on a cord
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Warm color, texture is soft, smooth and even sweet printed button work luxuriant .
sentences.chinese: 質地溫潤，色澤勻淨，光潤甜柔，印鈕作工華麗。

sentences.english: Generally, the seals of ancient Chinese emperors would have a knob with a dragon carved on it.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代皇帝用的印章一般都雕著龍形印鈕。
